title: Combining Suitcases
content:
I am looking for a way to put multiple fonts into the same suitcase so that they only appear as different weights. Could anyone point me in the right direction?

 [‹ Removing bitmaps from a font suitcase - Mac](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42928 "Go to previous forum topic") [Multiple diacritics ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173626/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42992 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Hofweber

comments.content: You can use [TransType](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173626/http:/www.fontlab.com/font-converter/transtype/), in which you’ll easily group separate fonts into one family/suitcase or you can do it manually by editing those fonts’ _name_ tables with [any font editor](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173626/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/font%252Beditors) which supports their format.
